info.name: YouTube - Watch Later Button Returns
info.description: Brings back the Watch Later button to the player when not in Fullscreen mode.
info.additionalInfo:
17.07.10 - Fix for recent changes to YouTube which kept this from working, again.

17.02.11 - Fix for recent changes to YouTube which kept this from working.

16.06.14 - Will no longer appear over the "More Info" menu.

16.02.13 - Will no longer appear over the "video wall" screen.

15.09.11 - Changed it so that the button only appears when you hover the mouse over the video player.
